channel.title: Does Any1 Know how
channel.description:
Well, i have a server. I know you need a VPS to make other ppl download your client and let you play it. But, im wondering how to get it at moparscape. When my friends try to play my server at moparscape, it keeps saying error connecting to server. Even though i: -Put the server online -Port-Forwarded -Changed all stuff at source&client to my Ip
What to do?

item.title: Does Any1 Know how
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

ehhm you dont need a VPS
iâ€™m hosting mine perfectly without

did you check ur firewall?
and if you have a downloadle client just upload to (i recommend mediafire) and give them the link then thell be fine (normaly)

if it still dident work just PM me the download link of ur client
ill try to find it
if i dont then maybe ur computer is blocking it
